statement: I'll give you a string, print only its vowels in order of appearance and one per line.
Is it prime? I'll give you a list of space separated integers (all greater than 1), you tell me how many are.
Hello there. Let's chat. I'll give you a list of space separated numbers and for each of them tell me how many divisors it has (print one per line). For example, 4 has 3 divisors: 1, 2 and 4.

I ate some nuclear chili that didn't go in very well. Help me getting over the awful pain by telling how many positive palindromic numbers (numbers that read the same backwards like 2002) are there bellow 3000
Things are heating up! I'll give you a list of space separated integers, give me (one per line) the smallest prime number larger than each given integer (for 3 the answer is 5).
